data.eml:eml: A new Grapholita species from Sumatra, Indonesia (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Olethreutinae: Grapholitini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heppner, John B., Bae, Yang-Seop (2019): A new Grapholita species from Sumatra, Indonesia (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Olethreutinae: Grapholitini). Zootaxa 4603 (3): 589-591, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4603.3.12
